info.summary:
Armando Stellato works as a member in AI Research Group, Dept. of Computer Science, Systems and Production, University of Rome, Rome, Italy, and his\her h-index is 15, g-index is 26. His\Her interests are :
 Semantic Web; Semantic Turkey; Knowledge Management; Semantic Annotation; Semantic Bookmarking;
